Documentation for Orders App Views

orders.views.order_tracking_view(request)

Handles the order tracking page.

Allows users to submit a tracking ID via a form (POST) or view the empty form (GET). If a valid tracking ID is submitted, it attempts to retrieve the corresponding Order object and displays its details. Handles invalid ID formats and non-existent orders by displaying error messages.

Parameters:

request (django.http.HttpRequest) – The HttpRequest object containing form data if POST.

Returns:

Renders the ‘orders/order_tracking.html’ template with context containing the form, the found order (if any), and any error messages.

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse
